patterns: Are there times when the estate is closed ?
Can my visitors come at anytime?
What time do the gatemen leave?
responses: Gates are open every day from 8am-11pm
Visitors can come to visit from 8am-11pm every day

patterns: How do I add a gateman?
my visitors don't see a gateman
responses: How to add A Gateman: Click on the menu Options,click on Manage Gateman and then click on the add new gateman button.

patterns: notifications don't get to my phone
responses: Click on the menu Options, Go to Settings and toggle the turn notifications Icon

patterns: tell gateman someone is coming to see me
someone is coming to see me
responses: How to Schedule Visits: You schedule a visit by adding a visitor, you can do this by clicking on the visitor bottom menu
